data.fullContent: Nitrogen dioxide is very toxic. It is also released by some cars, polluting the atmosphere. It has a bad odor. It makes mushroom clouds ( clouds produced when a nuclear weapon explodes ) reddish-brown. It can stop the nose from smelling, making the person unaware that they are breathing toxic fumes.
data.answer: 二氧化氮是剧毒的。它也被一些汽车释放，污染大气。它有一股难闻的气味。它使蘑菇云(核武器爆炸时产生的云)变成红褐色。它可以阻止鼻子闻到气味，使人不知道他们正在呼吸有毒气体。
